languages.text:
This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>TGH</u>{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>difficulty tier</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
If the creature is currently affected by {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimation Protocol{/g}, it does not gain any armour.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо восстанавливает 10% от своего максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, а также получает +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +собственный {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. Если на существо действует реанимационный протокол, оно не получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к броне.

traits.locale_text: This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. If the creature is currently affected by Reanimation Protocol, it does not gain any armour.

This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. If the creature is currently affected by Reanimation Protocol, it does not gain any armour.

This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. If the creature is currently affected by Reanimation Protocol, it does not gain any armour.

languages.text:
Esta criatura recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. También obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>RES</u>{/g} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.
Si la criatura está bajo los efectos de {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Protocolo de reanimación{/g}, no recibe armadura.
languages.original_text:
This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>TGH</u>{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>difficulty tier</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
If the creature is currently affected by {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimation Protocol{/g}, it does not gain any armour.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. También obtiene +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y +nivel de desafío de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. Si la criatura está bajo los efectos de Protocolo de reanimación, no recibe armadura.

languages.text:
此生物每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复10%的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。此生物还会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}，加成百分比等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>坚韧</u>{/g}，以及额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}加成，加成等同于{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>难度等级</u>{/g}。
如果此生物当前受到{g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}重塑协议{/g}影响，则不会获得任何护甲加成。
languages.original_text:
This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>TGH</u>{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>difficulty tier</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
If the creature is currently affected by {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimation Protocol{/g}, it does not gain any armour.

traits.locale_text: 此生物每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复10%的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}最大生命值{/g}。此生物还会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}加成，加成百分比等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}值，以及额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}加成，加成等同于难度等级。 如果此生物当前受到重塑协议影响，则不会获得任何护甲加成。

此生物每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复10%的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。此生物还会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}，加成百分比等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}，以及额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}加成，加成等同于难度等级。 如果此生物当前受到重塑协议影响，则不会获得任何护甲加成。

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur erhält 10 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} zurück. Außerdem erhält sie +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>ZÄH</u>{/g} % {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>Schwierigkeitsstufe</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.
Ist die Kreatur mit {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimationsprotokoll{/g} belegt, erhält sie keine Rüstung.
languages.original_text:
This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>TGH</u>{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>difficulty tier</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
If the creature is currently affected by {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimation Protocol{/g}, it does not gain any armour.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erlangt 10 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} zurück. Darüber hinaus erhält sie +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g} % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} and +Schwierigkeitstyp {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}. Falls die Kreatur momentan von einem Reanimationsprotokoll betroffen ist, erhält sie keine Rüstung.

languages.text:
Cette créature récupère 10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Elle bénéficie également de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}bonus{/g} de +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}<u>END</u>{/g} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}armure{/g} et de +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>niveau de difficulté</u>{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.
Sous l'effet de {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Protocole de réanimation{/g}, la créature ne gagne aucun point d'armure.
languages.original_text:
This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>TGH</u>{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>difficulty tier</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
If the creature is currently affected by {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimation Protocol{/g}, it does not gain any armour.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature récupère 10 % de sa {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}réserve de blessures{/g} maximum au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Elle bénéficie également de +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}% d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et +type de difficulté de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}. Sous l'effet de Protocole de Réanimation, la création ne gagne aucun point d'armure.

languages.text: この生物は、各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の10%を回復する。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を+{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}する。 この生物が現在蘇生プロトコルの効果を受けている場合、アーマーは増加しない。
languages.original_text: This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. If the creature is currently affected by Reanimation Protocol, it does not gain any armour.

traits.locale_text: この生物は、各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の10%を回復する。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を+難易度タイプする。 この生物が現在蘇生プロトコルの効果を受けている場合、アーマーは増加しない。

languages.text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо восстанавливает 10% от своего максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, а также получает +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +собственный {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. Если на существо действует реанимационный протокол, оно не получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к броне.
languages.original_text: This creature restores 10% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} and +difficulty type {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. If the creature is currently affected by Reanimation Protocol, it does not gain any armour.

traits.locale_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо восстанавливает 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, а также получает +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}бонус ВЫН{/g}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g} и +уровень сложности к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. Если на существо действует реанимационный протокол, оно не получает бонус к броне.

В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо восстанавливает 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, а также получает +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}бонус ВЫН{/g}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g} и +уровень сложности к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. Если на существо действует реанимационный протокол, оно не получает бонус к броне.

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başlangıcında maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %10'unu tazeler. Ayrıca +%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>DAY</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} ve +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>zorluk derecesi</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanır.
Yaratık, mevcut durumda {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Canlandırma Protokolü{/g} etkisindeyse zırh kazanmaz.

It also gains +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}<u>TGH</u>{/g}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}<u>difficulty tier</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
